pages.text: As a vampire, you can move quickly and gracefully. This ability allows you to travel at remarkable speed, making it easier to escape danger or chase down prey. Use the fast travel keybind ($(k:maleficium.fast_travel)) to use this ability. Note that this ability has a range of 100 blocks and can be used to essentially teleport to a location within that range.

pages.title: Hunger Requirement
pages.text: This ability requires you to have at least 4 full blood points which will be consumed when you use it. If you do not have enough blood points, the ability will not work.

pages.title: Warning
pages.text: This ability cannot be used while falling, standing on soul sand, while on fire, while in water or lava, while sleeping, while in powdered snow, or while riding an entity.
